title: Fullbear2222
author: Fullbear2222
content: We know that USA control oil trades through USD.We Also know that USA financial instutions want to get more in to btc and crypto.For example CME benchmark added more crypto currencies like ltc,avax,sol and more.In order to run currency you need to connect currency with something wich Are sacred the resource wich is limited either gold oil or btc.Yes it's de-dollarisation of USD from oil but it's in dollarsation to BTC.People talking USA empire lose but they don't realise USA will have more control over the world through crypto.20-30 years Ago most wealth the oil kings Made becouse they got early in to oil.Now from here the most of the wealth Will be Made not with oil but with crypto the next 20-30 years.The joint operation of UAE and USA moving in btc and crypto now it means big guys invest first before the crypto becomes Even bigger then it is now.The instutions actions show us what are the big Money guys real attentions.Whoever runs the country of USA he or she is very smart while all the world Will de-dollarisation of USD they don't realise that move is the check mate in this chess game on favoure the USA off course most people not smart like i am who can see and analyse everything.The sad truth is all other Industries Will collapse and crypto Will be only what Will shine.And while people move out of USD and oil they move in crypto and btc they dont realise that's the USA new plan becouse it's the USA markets and Fed who control crypto and btc.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.created_time: February 09, 2023, 12:51:01 PMLast edit: February 09, 2023, 01:21:46 PM by EarnOnVictor
comments.body: What you wrote is baseless, sorry to say, there is no way crypto will ever replace oil or the USD, they are different things serving good purposes for humanity. Crypto can't function without fiat, we should not decide ourselves, and no responsible government will solely accept it judging by its rapid price fluctuation, and the USD will always be the most reliable fiat being at the forefront of its dispensation.This did not just happen, the USD has proven itself over several decades, and a crude oil swap with it will always be the most sort for, with no foreseeable alternative in sight for now.

comments.author: Fullbear2222
comments.body: Quote from: EarnOnVictor on February 09, 2023, 12:51:01 PMWhat you wrote is baseless, sorry to say, there is no way crypto will ever replace oil or the USD, they are different things serving good purposes for humanity. Crypto can't function without fiat, we should not decide ourselves, and no responsible government will solely accept it judging by its rapid price fluctuation, and the USD will always be the most reliable fiat being at the forefront of its dispensation.This did not just happen, the USD has proven itself over several decades, and a crude oil swap with it will always be the most sort out for.Well look the most liquity to crypto comes from USA USD.Im not talking to crypto replace USD my point is more that oil is done and gold is old so new digital economy will be the kingdom of BTC.I say more that btc and crypto Will save the USD not replace it.Also crypto is smooth bridge to go other system from the fiat old system otherwise we would have economic liquity problems and crash all the world but crypto Will be bridge If the softer landing.So Im not saying crypto replace USD the Point more here that btc Will save USA and USD.People think that history will repeat that USA empire Will be replaced by other empire like it was dutch empire or united kingdom well i got news for you it aint gona happend USA dominance through crypto Will be Even stronger.Dont forget that If Fed did not pump up the markets btc price would be 5000$ max Anyone who try say about economic matters should study this subject off course those who knows how it's working they dont want people to learn about right things about it.But some people like me been spend time to speak people who Actually been learning how it's all working and you can't fool them.The bricks new currency Will be biggest lia in history i Will not bet on china never good Luck for those who bet on china instead of USA Nice to see how many investors gona lose their .USD becouse in fear they try to get rid of the USD What everybody who knows a lot see is that btc will start backing the USA dollar world Will be not oil anymore but bitcoin Will replace oil and electricity and AI robots and algorytms come in to play.
